About

We are what we eat.

Think #foodstagram where you can go to view how your friends see food without pictures of clouds getting in the way . The discussions will start from there as you will be able to share, learn, and be inspired!

You are currently logged in as me, Pat Needham. I've done user authentication before so I want to build on other aspects first for this project. Please don't post anything I wouldn't eat!
